channel.title: Enviromental Variables help?
channel.description:
I have followed tuts upon tuts on how to set enviromental variables but they never work for me, this is what i have
for user variables : I made a new one called "CLASSPATH" and put this in it:CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.
Then made another new one called PATH in user variables and put this:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin
Can someone help me with this?

item.title: Enviromental Variables help?

yes it does[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2009, 04:23:30 pm[/size][hr]to be honest i dont have to set envirmentals so good luck but ive ran server on friends comp couldnt figure out wat was wrong he called me yesterday and said that he upated java then it wouldnt work
